Title: 8:30 PM
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Michael Brandt (teleplay by), Derek Haas (teleplay by), Dick Wolf (story by), Matt Olmstead (story by), Craig Gore (executive story editor), Tim Walsh (executive story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: The Intelligence Unit race against the clock to find the bombers.
